hadiths.text: Amr bin Shu'aib narrated from his father, from his grandfather (Abdullah bin Amr Al-As), that :Allah's Messenger prohibited the recitation of poetry in the Masjid, and from selling and buying in it, and (he prohibited) the people from forming circles in it on Friday before the Salat

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْبَيْعِ وَالشِّرَاءِ وَإِنْشَادِ الضَّالَّةِ وَالشِّعْرِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Dislike For Buying, Selling, Loudly Seeking Out A Lost Item And Reciting Poetry In The Masjid
